resources.string:
Next feature release:
 路 Fix: Remove outdated Navigon navigation application
 路 Fix: Reorder menu items on logging screen to prevent accidental deletion of log
 路 Fix: Waypoints on mapsforge map hidden already below configured limit
 Known issue:
 Waypoints from other lists might leak onto the map....we are working on it
 路 New: Better keyboard layout while searching for geocaches or trackables on the search activity
